body_html: Yeah that won't work if you're using the default model. You have to give it the correct image size otherwise it will fail. CNNs carefully construct their architectures for a certain image size, you can't give them any size usually without some form of resize of reshape happening. If you read up CNNs hopefully you'll better understand the issue and ways to get around it. Sorry.

body: Yeah that won't work if you're using the default model. You have to give it the correct image size otherwise it will fail. CNNs carefully construct their architectures for a certain image size, you can't give them any size usually without some form of resize of reshape happening. If you read up CNNs hopefully you'll better understand the issue and ways to get around it. Sorry.
